name: New Innovative Smart Ball, TheO\u2122
blurb: TheO\u2122 is a specially designed soft-foam ball that enables smart devices and custom apps to get people moving and having fun.

rewards.reward: For a $5.00 pledge we\u2019ll send you a personal HAPPY NEW YEAR THANK YOU note for supporting our mission of encouraging physical, movement-based play and gaming.

Here\u2019s where we get physical!  For $25 you\u2019ll receive a brand-new production TheO ball, plus our 3 initial apps, Hot Potato, Bowling and Interrogo, plus your pick of 3 future apps as they become available, plus free shipping in the United States \u2013 a whopping $45.00 value sure to deliver hours of physical fun \u2013 all for only $25.  Please let us know your specific smart device.  The first TheO will accommodate iPhones and the iPod Touch and 95% of the current Android phones - we want to make sure your device fits.  Please add $8 to your pledge for shipping to Canada, $15 for shipping International.

Our Limited Holiday Special!  For a $30 dollar pledge receive a brand-new production TheO ball, plus our 3 initial apps, Hot Potato, Bowling and Interrogo, plus your pick of 3 future apps as they become available, plus free shipping in the United States \u2013 PLUS we\u2019ll send to whomever you wish, a custom printed plastic TheO card (similar to an iTunes card in a colorful holder) announcing your holiday gift of a \u201cSoon-To-Come\u201d TheO for a loved one or friend in time for the holidays (to be clear, the TheO will ship in early spring).  We\u2019ll send the gift card as soon as the Kickstarter promotion ends and it will arrive in time for holiday gift giving.  Be sure to specify the name and the address you\u2019d like the card to go to.   Sorry - no international option for this reward \u2013 the card may not arrive in time.

For a $60 pledge receive 3 TheO\u2019s, all going to the same address, and save $15 dollars!  That\u2019s 3 brand-new production TheO balls, plus 3x of our initial apps, Hot Potato, Bowling and Interrogo, plus your pick of 9 future apps as they become available, plus free shipping in the United States to one address.  We have to limit this reward to one order per household but you\u2019ll have plenty of TheO\u2019s  to toss around with friends and family, near and far.  Please add $20 to your pledge for shipping to Canada, $35 for shipping International.

This is our \u201cSpecial Limited Edition\u201d signed TheO!  We\u2019ll include a brand new iPod Touch ($199 value), plus a signed TheO Tee Shirt (don\u2019t forget to include the size), plus one of the first 500 TheO balls, signed and numbered by the inventors \u2013 Bob and Michele \u2013 sure to be a collectors item.  In addition you\u2019ll receive our 3 initial apps, Hot Potato, Bowling and Interrogo, plus your pick of 3 future apps as they become available, plus free shipping in the United States.  Please add $15 to your pledge for shipping to Canada, $30 for shipping International.
